data.title: Frank Lloyd Wright Houses by State
data.meta_description: Frank Lloyd Wright designed houses exist in most US states! Select a state from the map below to view local Frank Lloyd Wright and Wright-inspired buildings.
data.meta_site_name: Frank Lloyd Wright Sites | You're in the Wright Place!
data.text: Architecture and home design have always fascinated me. As a young girl I enjoyed drawing floor plans, rearranging my parentâ€™s furniture and playing with Lincoln Logs and Legos. My passion has always been the architecture of Frank Lloyd Wright. Since I have been old enough to drive a car, I have visited Frank Lloyd Wright homes in the Chicagoland area and attended the Wright Plus house walks. Now, as co-owners of Northern Sky Designs, my husband & I are able to combine our website design skills and FLW travels to bring you this website! Enjoy!
